basic.description: Building from the material in SOCY 226/3.0, SOCY 227/3.0 and SOCY 325/3.0, this course explores other developments in classical and contemporary theory since the early part of the twentieth century. A variety of theoretical schools are examined with some in greater depth than others.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Contemporary Social Theories II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    SOCY 325/3.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from SOCY 322/6.0; SOCY 325/3.0; SOCY 326/3.0
